abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32478910, pmid32496536, pmid32461409, pmid32461554, pmid32459293, pmid32459557, pmid32461673, pmid32459372, pmid32497298, pmid32497292, pmid32459408, pmid32459409, pmid32497288, pmid32458787, pmid32484950, pmid32462689, pmid32462173, pmid32497397, pmid32461625, pmid32462412, pmid32458502, pmid32496527, pmid32496938, pmid32497090, pmid32461511, pmid32461703, pmid32472775, pmid32495086, pmid32462177, pmid32459289, pmid32497290, pmid32495186, pmid32459287, pmid32459529, pmid32455503, pmid32484298, pmid32455442, pmid32497212, pmid32483978, pmid32493638, pmid32458596, pmid32496506, pmid32458382, pmid32459297
